item.description: A strong storm system that has brought relentless winds, rain and snowfall to California is expected to ease

item.title: Hawaii's Big Island bans feeding feral cats in an effort to help endangered native species
item.description: Hawaii's Big Island is banning people from feeding feral cats in an effort to protect native species, including an endangered goose

item.title: Storm system threatens more rainfall Christmas Day over waterlogged Southern California
item.description: Rain from a powerful winter storm that swept across Southern California has begun to taper off

item.title: California drivers warned to reconsider Christmas travel plans ahead of storms
item.description: California officials are urging holiday travelers to avoid the roads on Christmas Eve and Christmas Day

item.title: Rescuers rushed into flames to save nursing home residents after deadly explosion
item.description: Rescuers braved shooting flames, falling debris and the threat of more explosions to save nursing home residents after a blast at a Pennsylvania facil...
